__e: Uh, actually, it is because I live here, too, and this is affecting us all.
Maybe five years ago he was the fastest.. ..but.. ..time catches up with everyone.
Yeah, but it's not just about you anymore, because everything you do now affects all of us.
He won't say what it's about, only that it involves the safety of this station.
Even when I'm certain, even when it's absolutely clear to me, even when it affects the people I care about.
You think that all minds ate what?
What's happening here affects all four of us, and we're all here right now, so let's have a family meeting.
- From now on, before you do or say anything, you're gonna think about how it affects the people around you.
It didn't affect me or the kids at all, but he didn't tell me about it.
How does the part go that I say again?
Are people affecting the world of reality that they see?
I just wanted to come by and say... that I know it's your first day here... so if the blood gets to you don't worry about it.
And you never know how what you do will affect someone else.
Yes, I do... but that's only true if the past... doesn't actually affect the present.
What you do affects not only this team, but the entire school.
I do understand how it can have an impact, but I must consider the school.
And you're obviously very affected by this patient.
Honestly, and I don't know why this is, but it never really gets to me.
He's not affected by the sun like we are.
And I guess it doesn't hurt that you're a doctor.
I don't know if I'd said this yet, but when something in the past gets changed, it affects the future!
"Whatever" because it doesn't affect your world?
All I care about is how your behavior affects your job.
And that doesn't affect your view on her at all?
